posts.post_content: Sometimes i wonder if the designers did not make crappy cards just for fun. This card is excellent in a newbie deck, where each player plays his turn without surprises, combos etc
posts.html:

Posted By: bagilis (8/26/2010 4:48:56 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Me: I swing with Ivory Guardians and various goats at you bunch of red dudes.
  
Him: 0/1 goats... Dont care.
  
Me: [Mirrorweave](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mirrorweave)!!!
  
Him: Ha, you just turned my dudes white. no one gets buffed.
  
Me: Oh yeah? [Crimson Wisps](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Crimson Wisps)!!!!11!
  
I need to build this deck.
posts.html:

Him: 0/1 goats... Dont care.
Me: Mirrorweave!!!
Him: Ha, you just turned my dudes white. no one gets buffed.
Me: Oh yeah? Crimson Wisps!!!!11!
I need to build this deck.

posts.post_content:
Giants really go from one end of the spectrum to the other, don't they?  
  
On one end, we've got all those ugly brutes like [hill giant](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=hill giant), and on the other we've got this guy and [Fabio Titan](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=241833).
posts.html:
Giants really go from one end of the spectrum to the other, don't they?

On one end, we've got all those ugly brutes like hill giant, and on the other we've got this guy and Fabio Titan.

Yeah... not so good. Wish this card had a lower casting cost, but 6 for a potential 4/4 is brutal. Not one of my favorite pieces of art from Melissa Benson either, since she has done so much amazing work.
  
   
.5/5

Posted By: Gaussgoat (1/10/2010 10:03:53 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Legends is really just a hodgepodge of random card ideas that seemingly nobody bothered to balance for power (or Richard Garfield was the only one back then who understood card power level). It was just two guys who designed the set, before Alpha even came out. It's a good thing players back then were still playing their entire collections in 200-card 5-color decks and those gold cards were so fancy looking. Otherwise, Legends wouldn't have been received as well as it was. And this guy wasn't even the worst card of the lot...
posts.html:
Legends is really just a hodgepodge of random card ideas that seemingly nobody bothered to balance for power (or Richard Garfield was the only one back then who understood card power level). It was just two guys who designed the set, before Alpha even came out. It's a good thing players back then were still playing their entire collections in 200-card 5-color decks and those gold cards were so fancy looking. Otherwise, Legends wouldn't have been received as well as it was. And this guy wasn't even the worst card of the lot...
